SVGAnimatedTransformListBaseVal.summary: The baseVal read-only property of the interface represents the non-animated value of the transform attribute of an SVG element.

remarks.para: This property reflects the SVG element's {{SVGAttr("transform")}}, the {{SVGElement("linearGradient")}} or {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element's {{SVGAttr("gradientTransform")}} attribute, or the {{SVGElement("pattern")}} element's {{SVGAttr("patternTransform")}} attribute value as a readonly , providing access to a static for each transform function set on the SVG element.

SVGAnimatedTransformListBaseVal.value: An object that represents the current, non-animated value of the transform attribute.
